summary: When the crew of a bankrupt cargo ship gets stuck on board for months, isolation breeds pressures that sink the men into a sea of madness and terror.
cast: Nadir Saribacak|Hakan Karsak|Kadir Çermik|Özgür Emre Yildirim|Osman Alkas|Seyithan Özdemir|Baki Kurtulus|Ömer Acar|Çagdas Onur Öztürk|Serkan Öztürk
title: Sarmasik
